response.original_title: Up Close & Personal with the Lions - Australia 2001
response.overview: The Groundbreaking sports documentary - Life with the Lions down under. This programme provides the most intimate, blow by blow account of life on Tour ever seen with over three incredible hours of footage.
response.tagline: The Groundbreaking sports documentary - Life with the Lions down under. This programme provides the most intimate, blow by blow account of life on Tour ever seen with over three incredible hours of footage.
